SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.xml

Class XmlUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.xml.XmlUtil
public final class XmlUtil extends Object
A Utility class for handling org.w3c.dom documents and nodes.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    XmlUtil.DocumentWithNamespace
    A record that encapsulates an XML Document along with its associated NamespaceContext.

    • format

      public void format(Writer writer, Node node) throws IOException
      Pretty print W3C Node.
      Note: the writer should be using the UTF-8 character encoding!
      Parameters:
      writer - the writer to write to
      node - the node
      Throws:
      IOException - when an I/O error occurs

    • format

      public void format(Writer writer, Node node, Charset charset) throws IOException
      Pretty print W3C Document. Note that the provided charset should match the one used by the writer!
      Parameters:
      writer - the writer to write to
      node - the node
      charset - the Charset to use for encoding the output
      Throws:
      IOException - when an I/O error occurs

      Returns:

    • xpath

      public XPath xpath()
      Create XPath instance.

      The returned instance is not namespace aware. Either use xpath(Node) or supply a custom NamespaceContext if namespaces should be supported.

      Returns:
      new XPath instance.

    • xpath

      public XPath xpath(NamespaceContext ctx)
      Create XPath instance with a namespace context.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the NamespaceContext to use
      Returns:
      new XPath instance.

    • xpath

      public XPath xpath(String defaultUri)
      Create XPath instance with only a default namespace set The default namespace will be identified by the name "ns" in xpath expressions.
      Parameters:
      defaultUri - the URI of the default namespace
      Returns:
      new XPath instance.

    • xpath

      public XPath xpath(Map<String,String> nsToUri, @Nullable String defaultUri)
      Create XPath instance with a mapping and a default namespace.
      Parameters:
      nsToUri - mapping from namespace name to URI
      defaultUri - the URI of the default namespace
      Returns:
      new XPath instance.

    • xpath

      public XPath xpath(Node node)
      Create XPath instance for a node with a matching NamespaceContext.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to determine the used namespaces from
      Returns:
      new XPath instance generated from he supplied argument and its parent's namespace declarations.

    • documentBuilder

      public DocumentBuilder documentBuilder()
      Create new DocumentBuilder.
      Returns:
      new DocumentBuilder instance

    • collectNamespaces

      public static Map<String,String> collectNamespaces(Element element)
      Collects all namespace declarations from the given XML element and its descendants.
      Parameters:
      element - The root XML element for which namespaces need to be collected.
      Returns:
      A map containing namespace prefixes as keys and their corresponding URIs as values.

    • normalizeDocumentNameSpaces

      public static List<XmlUtil.DocumentWithNamespace> normalizeDocumentNameSpaces(Document... documents)
      Normalizes the namespaces of the given documents by creating a consistent namespace mapping.
      Parameters:
      documents - one or more documents to normalize. Each document should be a valid XML document. Documents with null document elements will be skipped in the process.
      Returns:
      a list of DocumentWithNamespace objects representing the normalized documents with unified namespaces.
